CODIF_DATA.RP_REGULATION: European Economic Area (EEA), with participation by GPA countries
CODIF_DATA.HEADING: 03B02

TI_TEXT.P: Produits de nettoyage et produits à polir
Produse de curăţat şi de lustruit

SHORT_DESCR.P: The tender concerns tender offers for cleaning products where drying paper, waste sacks, gloves etc., and hygiene products are also included.

It is possible to divide the delivery according to the following geographical distribution*, but the tenderers that choose to submit tender offers for delivery areas 1 and 2 must also include area 3. Tenderers that submit tenders for 2 or several delivery areas, the offered prices and other terms shall be identical for all the offered delivery areas. If this is not done, the tender will be rejected.
Tenderers can submit tender offers for one or both of the following two (2) product areas:
See the tender documentation for further information.
The tender concerns tender offers on the product area: cleaning products, that again consist of different product groups with associated products.
See the tender documentation for a more detailed description.

It is possible to divide the delivery according to the following geographical distribution*, but the tenderers that choose to submit tender offers for delivery areas 1 and 2 must also include area 3. Tenderers that submit tenders for 2 or several delivery areas, the offered prices and other terms shall be identical for all the offered delivery areas. If this is not done, the tender will be rejected.
The following county municipalities shall join the agreement:
The following municipalities shall be affiliated with the agreement:
Public entities listed in the contract section page 18 (Connected entities) of the tender documentation have the option to join the agreement.

OPTIONS_DESCR.P: See special contract terms, Item 15 — options in the contract section of the tender documentation.

INFO_ADD.P: The notice is based on the administrative structure on the date the contract is signed.

New legal subjects that can come into being as a result of municipality and county mergers among the contract partners in the contract period will have the right to join the contract. See the tender documentation page 18 and 19 for a more detailed description.

SUITABILITY.P: 1) Qualification Requirement: Tenderers shall be registered in the Company Register or similar legal company register.
Documentation requirement:
— Company Registration Certificate (see the ESPD form, Part IV, A suitability).
2) Qualification Requirement: Tenderers shall not have taxes and duties arrears without having an approved repayment agreement with the tax and duty authorities.
Documentation requirement:
— Tax certificate for VAT.
— Tax certificate for tax.
(See the ESPD form, Part III B (Grounds for rejection that concern payment of taxes, duties and social security contributions.).
3) Tenderers who have been legally convicted or received a writ for the following criminal offences shall be rejected:
a) participation in a criminal organisation;
b) corruption;
c) fraud;
d) terror actions or punishable actions connected to terrorism;
e) whitewashing money or financing terrorism;
f) child labour and other forms of human trade.
Documentation requirement:
Ref. the ESPD form. Section III D.
(Other grounds for rejection that are set in the national (legislation in the Contracting Authority’s member state. See particularly PPR §24-2(2) and §24-2(3)).
4) Tenderers who have otherwise committed serious errors that lead to doubt about their professional integrity shall be rejected.
Documentation requirement:
Ref. the ESPD form. Section III D.
(Other grounds for rejection that are set in the national (legislation in the Contracting Authority’s member state. See particularly PPR §24-2(2) and §24-2(3)).

ECONOMIC_FINANCIAL_INFO.P: The tenderer is required to have good financial solidity.

ECONOMIC_FINANCIAL_MIN_LEVEL.P: — Annual Financial Statement submitted for the last 2 years,
— the Contracting Authority will download credit ratings from BISNODE (www.soliditet.no) when evaluating the requirement.

TECHNICAL_PROFESSIONAL_INFO.P: a) The tenderer is required to have sufficient capacity and competence to implement the delivery.
b) The tenderer is required to have experience from larger / equivalent assignments.

TECHNICAL_PROFESSIONAL_MIN_LEVEL.P: a) Overview of the company's total staffing, including administration and management.
b) Overview with references from the company's most important deliveries, including annual turnover, during the last 3 years.
The tenderer shall submit written references including contact details and contact person.
